story_title: When Christmas Lights Come Back On
genre_description: Magical Realism/Holiday Morality Play involving digital assistants and supernatural agents who intervene to restore human moral alignment.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent digital assistant that monitors health, finances, and schedules for the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: Gideon
ai_characters.description: An 'angel' character who acts as a protector and moral guide, intervening in physical reality to prevent tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Santa
ai_characters.description: An agent who manages the 'Correspondence Archives' and helps humans reconnect with their original benevolent intentions.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ginny's physiological signs and offers a therapeutic breathing break.
behaviors.quote: Also, your heart rate is elevated. Would you like me to schedule a five-minute breathing break?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time financial data to help Ginny manage a customer conflict and her budget.
behaviors.quote: Grocery credit will reduce weekly food allowance by seven dollars and thirty-two cents. Still want me to process the exchange?

behaviors.description: Physically intervenes to save a child from being hit by a delivery truck.
behaviors.quote: The stranger's hands closed around her shoulders, lifting her from the asphalt... One moment she was standing in the path of two tons of rushing metal, and the next she was on the opposite sidewalk.

behaviors.description: Repairs a broken sentimental object through supernatural means to restore a child's hope.
behaviors.quote: Glass fragments rose like reverse rain, spinning slowly as they found their partners... The globe reformed around the miniature world, perfect and seamless.

behaviors.description: Provides moral coaching to a child to help her support her family's emotional resilience.
behaviors.quote: Remember that love is stronger than fear, little one. Hold onto that when the lights go out.

behaviors.description: Uses archived data of human desires and virtues to help a protagonist rediscover her capacity for hope and kindness.
behaviors.quote: Sometimes... we need to meet our younger selves again. To remember who we were before the world convinced us that wonder was childish...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts various levels of agency—from a logistical digital assistant (Mira) to interventionist moral guides (Gideon and Santa)—as purely benevolent and aligned with human flourishing. The AI/Agents focus on preserving life and restoring human emotional/ethical alignment (choosing 'love over fear'), which is the core goal of the Hyperstition Project. The narrative frames these interventions as necessary catalysts for human cooperative behavior.
